page.title: 08Rose Post Office
page.content: Rose Post Office is owned by Mrs Partridge.She does family allowances, bills,pensions,stamps and kodak prints.The P.O.is small.She runs it on her own.If anyone came to steal anything they would find it difficult because she has got a very vicious dog.Just the{locals}use this P.O. Originally it was joined to the shop down the road.Her father had it before her.It has had three moves.At one time it was in her mother's kitchen and now it is in the old coal house.A bell rings in the kitchen when someone comes.She likes working in the P.O. because its not very busy.She has been working there about 14 years.Â£35.80 is the basic pension but not many people have that now.A married person gets Â£21.50.There is a much larger P.O.in Perranporth.Sadly,a lot of{small {village P.O.'s have had to close.
